name: Never Take The Scenic Route!
description:
NEVER TAKE THE SCENIC ROUTE!

This is a mind numbing, hypnotic survival game. Try to collect as many magical orange traffic cones as possible before being killed by a never-ending supply of lions. As the driver of the world’s oldest bus, you are limited to the constraints of a 3.4 horsepower engine. My high score is 32. Can you beat that?
